column2: Vulcan Materials Co. engages in the provision of basic materials and supply for infrastructure and construction industry. The company is headquartered in Birmingham, Alabama and currently employs 8,373 full-time employees. The firm operates through four segments: Aggregates, Asphalt Mix, Concrete and Calcium. The Aggregates segment produces and sells aggregates (crushed stone, sand and gravel, sand, and other aggregates) and related products and services (transportation and other). The firm produces and sells asphalt mix in Arizona, California, New Mexico and Texas. The firm produces and sells ready-mixed concrete in Georgia, Maryland, New Mexico, Texas, Virginia, Washington District of Columbia and the Bahamas. The Calcium segment consists of a Florida facility that mines, produces and sells calcium products. As of December 31, 2016, it had 337 active aggregates facilities. The firm sells aggregates that are used as ballast for construction and maintenance of railroad tracks.
